lazrs
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which lazrs installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using lazrs, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load lazrs/0.7.0-GCCcore-14.2.0
```
